publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3560 Ross Finnie: The Draft Genetically Modified Organisms (Deliberate Release) (Scotland) Regulations 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Genetically Modified Organisms (Deliberate Release) (Scotland) Regulations 2002 be approved." Supported by: Allan Wilson*
